panels.description: Job and pipeline failure rates by workspace (adapts to dashboard time range).

targets.expr:
sum by (workspace_id) (increase(databricks_job_run_status_total{job=~"$job",workspace_id=~"$workspace_id",instance=~"$instance", status=~"FAILED|ERROR"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval))
/
sum by (workspace_id) (increase(databricks_job_run_status_total{job=~"$job",workspace_id=~"$workspace_id",instance=~"$instance"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval))

sum by (workspace_id) (increase(databricks_pipeline_run_status_total{job=~"$job",workspace_id=~"$workspace_id",instance=~"$instance", status="FAILED"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval))
/
sum by (workspace_id) (increase(databricks_pipeline_run_status_total{job=~"$job",workspace_id=~"$workspace_id",instance=~"$instance"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval))

panels.title: Failure rate by workspace
